This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition

cognitive-status Cognitive StatusCognitive Status category
treatment-intervention-preference Treatment Intervention PreferenceA personal preference for a type of medical intervention (treatment) request under certain conditions.
